# dnacenter_sensor_test_run (Data Source)

It performs update operation on Sensors.

- Intent API to run a deployed SENSOR test

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dnacenter_sensor_test_run" "example" {
  provider      = dnacenter
  template_name = "string"
}
```
